entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

Temperature: 1.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
